00033 float Vector::length()
00034 {
00035         float len = sqrt( x *x + y * y + z * z );
00036         return len;
00037 };
00038 
00039 void Vector::normalize()
00040 {
00041         float len = sqrt( x *x + y * y + z * z );
00042         x /= len;
00043         y /= len;
00044         z /= len;
00045 }

00054 float Vector::dot( Vector v1 )
00055 {
00056         return  float(x * v1.x + y * v1.y + z * v1.z);
00057 }

00059 Vector Vector::cross( Vector v1 )
00060 {       
00061         return Vector( y * v1.z - z  * v1.y, z * v1.x - x  * v1.z, x * v1.y - y  * v1.x );
00062 }

00064 float Vector::angle( Vector v1 )
00065 {
00066         Vector v2 = *this;
00067         return acos( v1.dot( v2 ) );
00068 }

00071 Vector Vector::reflection( Vector n )
00072 {
00073         n.normalize();
00074         Vector d = *this;
00075 
00076         d.normalize();
00077         float scaler = d.dot( n ) * 2.0f;
00078         Vector r = n * scaler;
00079 
00080         return Vector( d - r );
00081 }
00082 
00083 Vector Vector::refraction( Vector n, float iorold, float iornew )
00084 {
00085         n.normalize();
00086         
00087         const float PI = 3.14159265358979323846f;
00088 
00089         float jn = 1.0f;
00090         float refIndexT = iornew;
00091         float refIndexI = iorold;
00092 
00093         float r1 = ((float)(rand() % 1000)) / 1000.0f;
00094         float r2 = ((float)(rand() % 1000)) / 1000.0f;
00095 
00096         float a = sqrtf(1 - powf(r1, 2.0f / (jn + 1.0f)));
00097         float phi = 2 * PI * r2;
00098 
00099         float x = a * cos(phi);
00100         float y = a * sin(phi);
00101         float z = powf(r1, 1.0f / (jn + 1.0f));
00102 
00103         Vector inVec = *this;
00104         float vecDotN = inVec.dot( n );
00105         float bb = (vecDotN >= 0)? refIndexT / refIndexI : refIndexI / refIndexT;
00106         float aa = 0;
00107         float D2 = 1 - bb * bb *(1 - vecDotN * vecDotN);
00108 
00109         if(D2 < 0) {
00110                 return Vector(0,0,0);
00111         }
00112 
00113         if(vecDotN > 0) {
00114                 aa = bb * vecDotN - sqrt(D2);
00115         } else {
00116                 aa = bb * vecDotN + sqrt(D2);
00117         }
00118 
00119         Vector refractedVec = inVec * bb - n * aa;
00120         return refractedVec;
00121 };

00127         z = -z;
